channel.title: github_trending
channel.description: Latest posts from https://github.com/trending. follow.is: None

item.title: rustdesk /rustdesk
item.description: An open-source remote desktop application designed for self-hosting, as an alternative to TeamViewer.

item.title: zhayujie /chatgpt-on-wechat
item.description: 基于大模型搭建的聊天机器人，同时支持 微信公众号、企业微信应用、飞书、钉钉 等接入，可选择GPT3.5/GPT-4o/GPT-o1/ DeepSeek/Claude/文心一言/讯飞星火/通义千问/ Gemini/GLM-4/Claude/Kimi/LinkAI，能处理文本、语音和图片，访问操作系统和互联网，支持基于自有知识库进行定制企业智能客服。

item.title: openai /openai-cookbook
item.description: Examples and guides for using the OpenAI API

item.title: mendableai /firecrawl
item.description: 🔥 Turn entire websites into LLM-ready markdown or structured data. Scrape, crawl and extract with a single API.

item.title: ruanyf /weekly
item.description: 科技爱好者周刊，每周五发布

item.title: k2-fsa /sherpa-onnx
item.description: Speech-to-text, text-to-speech, speaker diarization, and VAD using next-gen Kaldi with onnxruntime without Internet connection. Support embedded systems, Android, iOS, HarmonyOS, Raspberry Pi, RISC-V, x86_64 servers, websocket server/client, C/C++, Python, Kotlin, C#, Go, NodeJS, Java, Swift, Dart, JavaScript, Flutter, Object Pascal, Lazarus, Rust

item.title: sgl-project /sglang
item.description: SGLang is a fast serving framework for large language models and vision language models.

item.title: jingyaogong /minimind
item.description: 🚀🚀 「大模型」50分钟完全从0训练26M的小参数GPT！🌏 Train a 26M-parameter GPT from scratch in just 50 min!

item.title: lobehub /lobe-chat
item.description: 🤯 Lobe Chat - an open-source, modern-design AI chat framework. Supports Multi AI Providers( OpenAI / Claude 3 / Gemini / Ollama / Qwen / DeepSeek), Knowledge Base (file upload / knowledge management / RAG ), Multi-Modals (Vision/TTS/Plugins/Artifacts). One-click FREE deployment of your private ChatGPT/ Claude application.

item.title: langgenius /dify
item.description: Dify is an open-source LLM app development platform. Dify's intuitive interface combines AI workflow, RAG pipeline, agent capabilities, model management, observability features and more, letting you quickly go from prototype to production.

item.title: Mintplex-Labs /anything-llm
item.description: The all-in-one Desktop & Docker AI application with built-in RAG, AI agents, and more.

item.title: unslothai /unsloth
item.description: Finetune Llama 3.3, DeepSeek-R1 & Reasoning LLMs 2x faster with 70% less memory

item.title: Bin-Huang /chatbox
item.description: User-friendly Desktop Client App for AI Models/LLMs (GPT, Claude, Gemini, Ollama...)

item.title: microsoft /terminal
item.description: The new Windows Terminal and the original Windows console host, all in the same place!

item.title: infiniflow /ragflow
item.description: RAGFlow is an open-source RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) engine based on deep document understanding.
